description: This luscious mango sorbet is rich, creamy, and bursting with the juicy-sweetness of mango and the creaminess of coconut milk!
name: Creamy Mango Sorbet
recipeIngredient: 4 cups diced ripe mango (frozen (about 4 large mangoes)
1-2 tbsp. agave or maple syrup (or to taste)
2 tsp. lime juice (could sub lemon juice)

recipeInstructions.text: Allow frozen mango to sit out for about 20 minutes, or microwave for a few seconds, until mango is very firm, but chunks can be separated with a knife.
Place all ingredients into food processor bowl and blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed. Taste test and adjust as needed.
Serve immediately, or place back in freezer for several hours for a firmer sorbet. Remove from freezer 10 minutes prior to serving.
